title: Mirror of Germany. No. 178 = Deutschland spiegel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Germany (West) - Politics and government
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Visits of state
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: 100th German Derby in Hamburg; retirement of Heinrich Lubke and the inauguration of Gustav Heinemann as Federal President; Australian Immigration Minister Snedden welcomed to Bonn; Gropius, founder of the Bauhaus in Weimar in 1919 dies in America; development of a rotary engine at the NSU factory in Swabia; an exhibition of art as play for the 1969 Ruhr Festival; an open air museum at Molfsee near Kiel; sailing events on the Bay of Kiel.
